message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.GT, cs.NA. 

The problem involves assigning radii to a set of points in the plane, which suggests computational geometry (cs.CG) as a likely sub-category. The requirement that the resulting set of circles be connected suggests graph theory (cs.GT) as another possible sub-category. The use of approximation algorithms and polynomial-time solvability also suggests algorithms and data structures (cs.DS) and discrete mathematics (cs.DM) as relevant sub-categories. Finally, the experimental results and use of polynomial-time approximation schemes suggest numerical analysis (cs.NA) as a possible sub-category.
